org.com.Model.Cards

Class MainCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.com.Model.Cards.Card
      • org.com.Model.Cards.SubCard
        • org.com.Model.Cards.MainCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Creditable, RentHistorysable, RentManager, SlaveCardManager

    public class MainCard
extends SubCard
implements SlaveCardManager, java.io.Serializable
    com.org.Main Card, Class that allow to create one type of subCard. THis Sub Card are the master. She's allowed to create SlaveCard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
